alert.note: Alert for Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; South Central Utah; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 15 at 10:48AM MDT until August 15 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity, South Central Utah and Zion National Park. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flash flooding of slot canyons, normally dry washes, slickrock areas, streams, urban areas, and low-lying flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; South Central Utah; Zion National Park
